Name: Starboost EX
About the game: Fly in space like Ironman with 30+ missions to play & deploy your own turrets & monsters into the battlefield. A story driven Sci-fi adventure game.b] Story 'BOOM' a ex-space engineer seeking revenge for his dead family that is killed by the 'Snakers', a extraterrestrial beings from a parallel universe of Gaia. What's Unique about this game? Starboost EX is a game that allows players to engage in both ground and air battles at the same time with advance flying mechanism. You are not alone. You can build A.I units such as turrets to help you in battle. If you wanted fiends, you can harvest underlings that are collected from monsters' eggs. They can also be deploy into battle. A total of 10 units can be deployed. Main Features Advance Flying mechanism inspired by the Ironman. 30+ missions with different objectives and goals. Create your Underlings to fight together with you. Build AI & Robots to assist you during battle. Different variety of missions include destroying key targets. protecting key targets and challenge courses. Varieties of enemy types and bosses
